source.b73e383c:
def proglang(df,n,max_row,label_name):
   
    lang = []
    count = []
    pl = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_Part_1']]
    for i in range(2,max_row+1):
        pl[f'Q{n}_Part_{i}'] = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_Part_{i}']]
    pl[f'Q{n}_OTHER'] = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_OTHER']]
        
    
    for j in range(1,max_row+1):
        for que in pl[f'Q{n}_Part_{j}'].dropna().unique():
            count.append(int(pl[f'Q{n}_Part_{j}'].shape - pl[f'Q{n}_Part_{j}'].isnull().sum()))
            lang.append(que)
    for q in pl[f'Q{n}_OTHER'].dropna().unique():
        count.append(int(pl[f'Q{n}_OTHER'].shape - pl[f'Q{n}_OTHER'].isnull().sum()))
        lang.append(q)
    d = {'count': count, 'lang': lang}
    plot_name = pd.DataFrame(data=d)
    plot_name['lang'] = plot_name['lang'].astype(str)
    plt.figure(figsize=(30,30))
    sns.set_style(style='darkgrid')
    total= float(len(plot_name['count']))
    ax = plot_name.plot(x='lang',y='count',kind='bar')
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.xlabel(label_name)

    for p in ax.patches:
        height = p.get_height()
        ax.text(p.get_x()+p.get_width()/2.,height+450
               ,'{:4.0f}'.format(height,ha='center'))
source.50727cf8:
def proglangsub(alphabet,df,n,max_row,label_name):
   
    lan = []
    cnt = []
    pl = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_1']]
    for i in range(2,max_row+1):
        pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_{i}'] = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_{i}']]
    pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_OTHER'] = data.loc[:,[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_OTHER']]
        
    
    for j in range(1,max_row+1):
        for que in pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_{j}'].dropna().unique():
            cnt.append(int(pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_{j}'].shape - pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_Part_{j}'].isnull().sum()))
            lan.append(que)
    for q in pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_OTHER'].dropna().unique():
        cnt.append(int(pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_OTHER'].shape - pl[f'Q{n}_{alphabet}_OTHER'].isnull().sum()))
        lan.append(q)
    d = {'count': cnt, 'lang': lan}
    plot_name = pd.DataFrame(data=d)
    plot_name['lang'] = plot_name['lang'].astype(str)
    plt.figure(figsize=(30,30))
    sns.set_style(style='darkgrid')
    total= float(len(plot_name['count']))
    ax = plot_name.plot(x='lang',y='count',kind='bar')
    plt.xticks(rotation=90)
    plt.xlabel(label_name)

    for p in ax.patches:
        height = p.get_height()
        ax.text(p.get_x()+p.get_width()/2.,height+450
               ,'{:4.0f}'.format(height,ha='center'))

source.817ddcfb:
**Surprisingly Dascommers favourite ML algorithm is linear and Logistic regression,next favourite is Decision trees and Random Forest**

**For Deep Learning CNN is preferred**
source.efd2e399:
**Some clear relation between qualification and experience of a Dascomemr**

**i.e Most of the Dascommer with Bachelor Degree are 1-2 year experienced**

**Most of the Dascommer with Master's Degree are 3-5 year experienced**
source.e2cc18df: **Most of the Dascommers doesn't prefer ML products because of it's limitations like explainability and interpretability issues,Infrastructure issues for scaling so Dascommer prefer ML only to enhance the performance of a product(i.e applying ML to a product)**
source.711db945: **ML method is gaining popularity day by day though only 19k Dascommer have ML method in production for more than 2 years,more prefer ML method in production for future years**
source.4691184f: **This backsup previous question i.e 71% of Dascommer recommend python language as first language for aspiring data scientist**
source.e73da8ec: **Though purpose of ML is to automate things,there are organisations working to automate process involved in ML for quick result,Dascommer yet to utilize these tools which is a future**
source.43e37934:
**Long time ago there born a gem. people thought it as an ordinary stone which of no use.
But as human started evoluting over the years he realized gem has value and started utilizing it.
Over the years as technology took pace ,this gem became more than a magical stone which showed true color of anything you want to analyze.
So people made a community to suck more from this gem & hence born 'Data Science Community' & that gem is 'DATA'.
Today will explore impact,priorities or concerns of DaSCommer.**
source.3131c69e: **Dascomemrs think Tensor board is future ML experiment tool and prefer to learn it**
source.8cefa7b4:
**Undoubtedly Matplotlib library is Dascommer's first choice for Data Visualization**

**because of it's wide range of graph,ability to combine with other library to provide other features**
source.a4929337: **Dascommer earnings equally distributed in all countries,Not much insight we can gain from this**
source.f5443959:
**Most of the Dascommer belong to United states of America**
**It is pretty obvious because Data Scientist was ranked best job in America,3 years in a row by Glassdoor**
source.cbd35d33: **Image classification methods were preferred by Dascommer for computer vision**
source.c704065d: **There is a clear fight between Microsoft power Bi and Tableau BI tool**
source.babe9368: **Continuation of previous analysis AWS cloud computing product EC2 was preferred by more Dascommer because of it's various adantages like scalable deployment of applications**
source.f6a271ef: **We can clearly see that 66% of Dascommer prefer personal computer or laptop instead of cloud computing may be because of security and downtime concerns**
source.ea0bc6f0: **Most of the Dascommer have either a Bachelor degree(35%) or Master's Degree(39%)**
source.e5f82cc5:
**Now will see Gender distribution of Dascommer age.**

**Can't conclude  Males clearly win coz most females prefer not to disclose age,**

**But we can draw conclusion that nearly 45% of Dascommer male age distributed mainly between age of 18-29**
source.ed0eeb27: **Machine Lerning is an emerging field,slowly Dascommer introducing new techniques for time reduction,one such tool is experiment tool gaining popularity day by day ,Tensor board is one such tool**
source.ee6040e5:
**Scikit learn is leading from front out of all frame works though xgboost also had popularity it's incorporated along with scikit learn only**y
**For Deep Learning Frameworks tensorflow and keras leading from front,pytorch trying to catch them year by year**
source.f6650585:
**Since the day of it's popularity Github never let other competitors nearby,Dascommer prefer GitHub a great version control system**

**Slowly Kaggle contributing dascom by helping Dascommers to share there insights of data through various IDE's**
source.473741c8:
**My sql was prefered Big Data product in past and it is a preferred sql in future too**

**But day by day data formats are changing so NoSQL products is also in demand out of which MongoDB is leading from front**
source.56e30dd9:
**You are all here to hear a story right!?**

**Note: I used two abbrevations here,**

**1) DaSCom - Data Science Community**

**2) DaSCommer - People belong to Data Science Community**

**let's start then,**
source.6d376cf9:
**Every business employing BI tools to fetch insights of the business so Dascommers preferred to learn Microsoft power Bi or Tableau**

**Interestingly Google Studio is gaining popularity day by day**
source.49476586: **As stated above Dascommers understood AutoML tool importance in future especially in model selection & full pipeline category**
source.12335f37: **More than 6k Dascommer prefer Kaggle Notebook and Colab Notebook as a Hosted Notebook on a regular basis**
source.032cad84:
**There are various way to learn DataScience like reading articles,blogs,notebooks watching videos**
**Dascommers prefer to learn through Kaggle notebooks ,forums also by watching videos and reading bolgs are preferred by dascommers**
source.57327d94:
**According to Dascommers AWS & GCP are future cloud computing platforms**
**We can clearly see future demand of cloud computing platforms**
source.b0a02d44:
**This is another future trend Dascommer preferred to gain grip on**

**Dascommer prefer to master Google cloud ML engine a great ML product ,Interestingly other google products also having near equal demand**
source.4f82e51a: **Dascommers prefer My SQL as a big data product**
source.c9b20e5a: **Only 32% of Dascommer used ML methods for less than a year ,most of them have been using from more than a year**
source.a34a7033: **We can clearly see Data Science is emerging in recent years so most Dascommer's experience lies between either 1-2 years or 3-5 years**
source.8ab3e030:
**Most of the Dascommer earnings ranges from 0-999$**

**1) Data Engineer,DBA/Database Engineer and Product/Project Manager has wide range of salary distribution,chances of more people earning 30,000-39,999 dollar is high when compared to Data Scientist,Research Scientist,Machine Learning Engineer,Statistician,Other,Data Analyst,Software Engineer roles**

**2) DBA/Database Engineer and Product/Project Manager has wide range of salary distribution,chances of more people earning 50,000-59,999 dollar is high when compared to Data Engineer,Data Scientist,Research Scientist,Machine Learning Engineer,Statistician,Other,Data Analyst,Software Engineer roles**

**3) Data Engineer and Product/Project Manager has wide range of salary distribution,chances of more people earning
70,000-79,999 dollar is high when compared to Data Engineer,Data Scientist,Research Scientist,Machine Learning Engineer,Statistician,Other,Data Analyst,Software Engineer roles**

**4) Interestingly Business Analyst salary is somewhat equally distributed**
source.1598465b: **Out of those Dascommer who are already using Auto ML Tool prefer Auto SK Learn**
source.bffbf066: **More than 11k Dascommer prefer Jupyter Notebook IDE on a regular basis may be Jupyter notebook is versatile as it supports 40 programming languages,Generates interactive output,allows numerous big data tools,etc..**
source.b4eada33:
**You can see that more than half of Dascommer's are under age 30 i.e whooping 56%**

**20% between age 25-29,around 19% between age 22-24,around 17% between age 18-21**
source.e7132456: **Though excel was ruling the Data Analysis field once,Now for more advance versions local development environments are prefered as a primary analysation tool**
source.9c8c41d8: **Data Analysis is fuel for Business growth that is what Dascommer conveying here**
source.b62d087b: **Many Dascommers are ready to spend more money to learn machine learning and/or cloud computing services at home (or at work)**
source.9ff72a4f: **Well Google's TPU officially available for third party use from 2018 so not much of Dascommer used it and not many times either**
source.a83f748e:
**Although all cloud computing products demand nearly equal in future**

**Google cloud compute engine is bit one step higher in race may be because of it's custom VM types,preemptible VM's ,sustained usage discounts,etc...**

**We can clearly see in nearby future cloud computing products will be a mandatory in Dascomemr's life**
source.86dd7972: **NLP Method is booming these days out of which word embeddings is widely used by Dascommer**
source.383db9cf: **More than 15k Dascommer prefer Python Language on a regular basis, that's why python gaining popularity day by day**
source.7363025d: **Since the evolution of internet over the years online learning has took pace,Coursera course attracting Dascomemrs,Along with it Kaggle learn course and Udemy is preferred online learning platform for Dascomemrs**
source.f02b5158: **We can see curse of dimensionality here,as experience increases dascommer prefer large firms but it started reducing at certain point**
source.f9deeef9: **AWS is occupying cloud computing market day by day beating Google cloud because of it's features like supporting more containers,hourly basis charges,etc....**
